column5: Fillet in 30 sec.   Grumpy old men http://us.imdb.com/title/tt0107050/trailer...lay-E11759-10-2  The Odd Couple-Part 1 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U4WM1uaZvGo  The Odd Couple-Part 2 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-HQuBWGVYx8...ted&search=
That 30 sec fillet looks pretty quick and simple.  dsn
I dunno, I think the guy who did the fillet in 30-seconds wastes a lot of meat.  I wouldn't let him fillet my catch.  I'd prefer to take more time with it and cut around the ribs.  IMHO.
I purchased an electric filet knife years ago and do all my Bass and Salmon with it.  Once you get on to them they can save you loads of time.
Like Mike said, I'd make him dig through what he was throwning out and make him cook chowder out of it, waste not, want not.  Anyone can fillet with a chainsaw.
Look at all the meat that is wasted from the walleye. He could have cut out the cheeks and the wings.
Love the old SUB that Matthau drove in that movie.
The Odd Couple -- what a classic.  No Electric Fillet Knives in them days!
